mapper.insert: insert into zf_photo (id, photo_path_front, photo_path_center, photo_path_after, apply_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{photoPathFront,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoPathCenter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoPathAfter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update zf_photo set photo_path_front = #{photoPathFront,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo_path_center = #{photoPathCenter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo_path_after = #{photoPathAfter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_id = #{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_upload = #{isUpload,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, photo_path_front, photo_path_center, photo_path_after, apply_id, is_upload from zf_photo

SELECT p.id, p.photo_path_front, p.photo_path_center, p.photo_path_after, p.apply_id, p.is_upload, z.person_id, z.template_id, z.template_path, z.house_photos_path, z.construction_path,z.name, z.identity, z.telphone, z.status FROM zf_photo p join (select z.id, z.person_id, z.template_id, z.template_path, z.house_photos_path, z.construction_path,x.name, x.identity, x.telphone, z.status from zf_apply z join xjhb_person x where x.id = z.person_id and x.name like #{name} and z.status in (4,5,6)) z WHERE p.apply_id = z.id and p.is_upload = 1
